title: Future Vision
description: Envision your ideal future and recovery goals

activities.title: My Ideal Future
activities.description: Envision your ideal future life and what it would look like

content.prompt: Imagine your ideal future - 1 year, 5 years, or 10 years from now. What would your life look like? Consider all aspects: relationships, career, health, hobbies, living situation, and how you'd feel about yourself.
followUpQuestions: What would your ideal day look like in the future?
What relationships would you have cultivated?
What would you be doing for work or personal fulfillment?
How would you feel about yourself and your body?

reflectionPrompts.title: My Future Self
reflectionPrompts.prompt: Imagine your future self - who you want to become through this recovery journey.
followUpPrompts: What qualities would your future self have?
How would your future self think and feel differently?
What would your future self be proud of?
What advice would your future self give to you today?

submodules.title: Recovery Milestones
submodules.description: Set specific milestones for your recovery

activities.title: Recovery Milestones
activities.description: Set specific milestones and goals for your recovery journey

content.prompt: What specific milestones would you like to reach in your recovery? Consider both short-term goals (next few months) and long-term aspirations (next year or beyond).
followUpQuestions: What are your most important short-term recovery goals?
What would be meaningful long-term recovery achievements?
How will you know when you've reached these milestones?
What support will you need to achieve these goals?

reflectionPrompts.title: Legacy and Impact
reflectionPrompts.prompt: Consider the impact you want to have on others and the world.
followUpPrompts: How do you want to be remembered by others?
What positive impact do you want to have on the world?
How might your recovery journey help others?
What would make you feel like your life has been meaningful?

submodules.title: Action Planning
submodules.description: Create concrete steps toward your vision

activities.title: Action Planning
activities.description: Create concrete action steps to move toward your future vision

content.prompt: Now that you have a vision for your future, what concrete steps can you take to move toward that vision? Consider both recovery-specific actions and general life goals.
followUpQuestions: What is one small step you can take this week?
What resources or support do you need to pursue your goals?
What might get in the way of achieving your vision?
How will you stay motivated when progress feels slow?

reflectionPrompts.title: Renewing My Commitment
reflectionPrompts.prompt: Reflect on your commitment to recovery and your future vision.
followUpPrompts: What are you most committed to in your recovery?
What would help you stay committed when things get difficult?
How can you remind yourself of your future vision?
What would you say to yourself on a hard day?
